Sentencas: Ceria is an excellent oxide catalyst to break H2 in the absence of noble metals and has shown great promise for potential applications in diverse technological fields.
Titulo: Dopant-induced surface activation of ceria nanorods for electro-oxidation of hydrogen and propane in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The catalytic activity of ceria is critically linked to surface composition and structure.
Titulo: Dopant-induced surface activation of ceria nanorods for electro-oxidation of hydrogen and propane in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Herein, selective doping with moderate lanthanide ions is reported to regulate surface oxygen vacancies and bonded adsorbates of ceria nanorods

Sentencas: Lanthanide doped ceria nanorods are hydrothermally synthesized, and electrochemically evaluated as the anode catalysts for reduced-temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: Dopant-induced surface activation of ceria nanorods for electro-oxidation of hydrogen and propane in solid oxide fuel cells
